metadata.name: A Deadly Bargain
metadata.description:
In the shadows, alliances are made,  
Sworn enemies now side by side,  
United by a common dread,  
Against the Sapphires' rise, they strive.

/-/-/-/-/-/

In a desperate bid to counter the growing threat of the Sapphires, human mafia and police forge a precarious alliance. Turning to a notorious crime lord for support, they put their differences aside for the greater good.

This gripping artwork captures the tense moment when unlikely allies unite against a common foe. The Sapphire skull on the table serves as a reminder of their formidable enemy.

As you explore this piece, you'll delve deeper into the intricacies of Sombro's underworld and discover the sacrifices and compromises made for survival. Witness the delicate balance of power in the city and the lengths its inhabitants will go to protect their way of life.
